INFRINGING URLs:

 

ALL OF THE CONTENT OF THIS WEBSITE IS STOLEN PROPERTY

..........................................

 


Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act  and the WIPO (World
Intellectual Property Organization) (
<http://lcweb.loc.gov/copyright/legislation/dmca.pdf>
<http://lcweb.loc.gov/copyright/legislation/dmca.pdf>), this letter serves
as actual notice of infringement in the event of legal proceedings.

 

I, Martin Perreault, am the legal owner of all photos mentioned in this
Notice and Takedown.
I certify that the information in this email is correct and true.  I have
proof that all images reported in this email belong to me, that I am the
legal owner, and that they are being used without my permission.  With this
Notice And Takedown, I request that the server be shut down and/or all
infringed material be removed from server immediately.


 

 

 


 

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

-- 

-Martin Perreault

Photographer and Agent of Model Bianca Beauchamp
